title: SOLD: T206 Polar Bear Bridwell with cap
author: Rob D.

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Polar Bear Bridwell with cap
posts.post_content:
When I put together the 250-card T206 Polar Bear subset, this card was the 246th card I acquired, right here on the good old B/S/T in May 2013 for $25. In the ensuing 14 months, I have seen only two other PB Bridwells with cap come up for sale. Though some would call this "research," I will merely submit that this front/back combo doesn't pop up all that often (at least it hasn't in the past three-plus years).

Very rare for the grade (I've not seen another with a stamp on the front)! Has the corners of a 1.5 or a 2!

Price is $xx delivered within the United States.

PayPal is fine. No need to "gift" your payment.

A commitment to buy takes precedence over an ongoing negotiation. :rolleyes:

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]Feel free to email any questions[/URL].

Thanks,

Rob

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol.com[/URL]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/otherphotos/bridwell-pb-4-sale.jpg[/IMG]

If no one buys this card for $20, it will be destroyed. You have 24 hours.

Thanks,

Rob

Hey Rob,

How will the card be destroyed?
I'd be interested in purchasing the exceeded deadline tattered remnants.

[quote name="seablaster" post=1312141]I'd be interested in purchasing the exceeded deadline tattered remnants.[/QUOTE]

They'll be mailed to you in 5 tiny boxes.

[quote name="Rob D." post=1312152]They'll be mailed to you in 5 tiny boxes.[/QUOTE]

Do you ship to Canada?

[quote name="seablaster" post=1312161]Do you ship to Canada?[/QUOTE]

I guess you'll have to settle for watching it on YouTube.

This is how my family ended with a pet rabbit when I was a kid.  Our neighbors got tired of their rabbit and said they were going to make rabbit stew if no one claimed the rabbit.  And my mom couldn't let that happen.

[quote name="LukeLyon" post=1312213]This is how my family ended with a pet rabbit when I was a kid.  Our neighbors got tired of their rabbit and said they were going to make rabbit stew if no one claimed the rabbit.  And my mom couldn't let that happen.[/QUOTE]

Al is praying some mom out there reads this thread.
